#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,a,b,c;
		cin>>n;
		cin>>a>>b>>c;
		int found=0;
		for(int i=9;i>0;i--)
		{
			if(found==1)
				break;
			for(int j=9;j>=0;j--)
			{
				int s=i*10000+a*1000+b*100+c*10+j;
				if(s%n==0)
				{
					found=1;
					cout<<i<<" "<<j<<" "<<s/n<<endl;
					break;

				}
			}
		}
		if(found==0)
			cout<<0<<endl;
	}
}
